Package net.nextinfinity.core.utils

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.nextinfinity.core.utils.Settings

  • public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
    The Settings class contains static values often accessed during runtime. The set methods should usually not be used except during game initialization.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Settings​()
